method.text: Lightly whip the cream and brandy together until it stands in soft peaks. Stir in the ginger syrup. Chill for 1 hour or until well chilled.
Meanwhile, place the rhubarb and sugar in a frying pan with enough water to just cover the base of the pan. Bring to the boil then simmer for 4-5 min or until softened.

Divide the gingered cream between serving glasses. Top with the drained rhubarb, sliced kiwi and nectarine. Pour <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub>0 ml of the orange juice over the top of each dessert and serve.
